FAIL_TO_PASS: when add custom help command then custom help command
when set description then get description
when use .description for command then help includes description
when not enough width then no wrap
when no custom setup and call formatHelp direct then effective helpWidth is fallback 80
when make minWidthToWrap small then wrap
when copyInheritedSettings then copies custom help command
when program has description then return description
when call helpInformation for program then help format is as expected (usage, options, commands)
